DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety feasibility Chemo-Immunotherapy use cyclophosphamide , docetaxel , OK-432 , autologous immature dendritic cell patient relapse refractory head neck squamous cell carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Chemo-Immunotherapy Head Neck Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . The patient relapse refractory head neck squamous cell carcinoma 2 . 20 year old 3 . ECOG performance status 01 4 . More 4 week must elapse time radiation therapy last dose chemotherapy 5 . Tumor lesion accessible intratumoral dendritic cell injection 6 . Patients able oral ingestion 7 . Patients must normal organ marrow function follow : Hb > 9.0 mg/dl Ht > 25 % WBC > 4000/mm3 Platelet count > 100,000/mm3 TBil < 1.5mg/dl GOT < x2.5 institutional upper limit normal GPT < x2.5 institutional upper limit normal Creatinin < 1.5mg/dl 8. sign inform consent 1 . Less 20 year 2 . Patients test positive Hepatitis B virus , Hepatitis C virus HIV . 3 . Patients clinically active infection 4 .
